name: ProBook Lite 14
description: A lightweight 14-inch laptop with 8 GB RAM and 256 GB SSD. Perfect for students and everyday productivity.

name: TitanX Gaming 16
description: 16-inch gaming powerhouse with RTX 4070, 16 GB RAM, and 144 Hz display. Built for competitive gamers.

name: SwiftPhone SE
description: Compact 6.1-inch smartphone with a great camera, all-day battery, and 128 GB storage.

name: SwiftPhone Ultra
description: Flagship phone with 6.7-inch AMOLED, 200 MP camera, 12 GB RAM, and 5000 mAh battery.

name: CloudPad 10
description: 10-inch tablet ideal for reading, streaming, and light work. Includes stylus support.

name: BassWave Pro Headphones
description: Over-ear wireless headphones with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery, and deep bass.

name: PixelWatch Sport
description: Fitness-focused smartwatch with heart-rate monitor, GPS, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery.

name: UltraDesk 27 Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K IPS monitor with USB-C, 99 % sRGB, and adjustable stand. Great for creators and developers.
